contentrichtext.text: [[File:Robert Comtesse.gif|right|Robert Comtesse, member of the Swiss Federal Council]] '''Robert Comtesse''' (14 August 1847 – 17 November 1922) was a [[Switzerland|Swiss]] politician and member of the [[Swiss Federal Council]] (1899-1912). He was elected to the [[Federal Council of Switzerland]] on 14 December 1899 and resigned on 4 March 1912. He was affiliated to the [[Free Democratic Party of Switzerland|Free Democratic Party]]. While in office he held the following departments: *[[Department of Finance (Switzerland)|Department of Finance]] (1900) *[[Department of Justice and Police]] (1901) *[[Department of Posts and Railways]] (1902) *[[Department of Finance (Switzerland)|Department of Finance]] (1903) *[[Political Department]] as [[President of the Confederation (Switzerland)|President of the Confederation]] (1904) *[[Department of Finance (Switzerland)|Department of Finance]] (1905 - 1909) *[[Political Department]] as President of the Confederation (1910) *[[Department of Finance (Switzerland)|Department of Finance]] (1911) *[[Department of Posts and Railways]] (1912) "Quai Robert-Comtesse" in [[Neuchâtel]] and "Rue Robert-Comtesse" in [[Cernier]] are named after Comtesse. == External links == *{{Swiss Federal Councillor|39}} *{{HDS|4460|Robert Comtesse}} {{start box}} {{succession box | before = [[Ludwig Forrer]] | title =[[President of the Swiss National Council|President of the National Council]]| years = 1893/1894 | after = [[Ernst Brenner]]}} {{succession box | before = [[Adrien Lachenal]] | title = [[Member of the Swiss Federal Council]] | years = 1899–1912 | after = [[Louis Perrier]]}} {{end box}} {{Swiss Presidents}} {{commonscat|Robert Comtesse}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Comtesse, Robert | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = 14 August 1847 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = 17 November 1922 | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Comtesse, Robert}} [[Category:1847 births]] [[Category:1922 deaths]] [[Category:Members of the Swiss Federal Council]] [[Category:People from Val-de-Ruz District]] {{Switzerland-politician-stub}}
